> Graphs/Tables:

```{r}
vg_clean %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = price))+
  geom_density() +
  theme_classic()

top_ten_avrplaytime_game <- vg_clean %>% 
  select(game, average_playtime) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_playtime)) %>% 
  top_n(10)

top_ten_avrplaytime_game
```
